title: London tops world city rankings - Again (UKIP - United Kingdom Independence Party)
text: ( Source : UKIP - United Kingdom Independence Party ) In a survey carried out by Japanese research foundation, the Mori Institute for Urban Strategies London has been listed as the most powerful city in the world for the fourth successive
